name: Star Wars: TGA
description:
This game is for the Weekly Game Jam

The Jedi temple is under attack! Emperor Palpatine has commenced order 66, also known as the greatest ambush in star wars history. It is your job to take down as many clone trooper as you can before they take over.

W,A,S,D - look in that direction

Mouse - aim projectile

Right Mouse Button - attack

Left Mouse Button - deflect 

Models:

StrangeUsernames1

Ima Gun Di

Admiral Tributon

HoogFlood

Audio:

John Williams

Jake Rutigliano
